title: Blogstify
description: Blogstify is a modern, serverless blog platform with real-time engagement features. Built with Convex and Next.js, it delivers instant interactions without the complexity of managing traditional infrastructure.

title: Vanish
description: A private, self-destructing chat room. Messages disappear. No logs. No history.

title: Resume.gg
description: AI-powered resume feedback system using Puter.js. Features a multi-step upload flow with Zustand state management and serverless PDF processing.

title: LocatoR
description: A simple real-time location tracking application built with Node.js, Express, Socket.io, and Leaflet.js.
